entry.def: If you describe something as teeny, you are emphasizing that it is very small.

example.ex: Sue never carried anything other than the teeniest purse.
example.tran: 休从来都只带着一只小钱包。

auth_sentence.content: Right above its stomach you'll see a teeny white thing beating.
auth_sentence.res_content: Right above its stomach you'll see a teeny white thing beating.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Right above its stomach you'll see a teeny white thing beating.

auth_sentence.content: I bet you could swallow this teeny-tiny pill if you really tried.
auth_sentence.res_content: I bet you could swallow this teeny-tiny pill if you really tried.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I bet you could swallow this teeny-tiny pill if you really tried.

auth_sentence.content: Serve them tapas and they'd have grumbled about the insultingly teeny portions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Serve them tapas and they'd have grumbled about the insultingly teeny portions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Serve them tapas and they'd have grumbled about the insultingly teeny portions.
